orderConfirmation_success: Your order has been placed successfully.
orderConfirmation_preparation: The restaurant will start preparing it shortly.
unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
noMenuCategoriesYet: This restaurant has not added any menu categories yet.
menuSubtitle: Explore our carefully curated dishes, made with fresh ingredients and passion.
dineInSubtitle: Scan the QR code at your table to view the menu and order directly from your phone. No app download required.
bookTableSubtitle: Experience the atmosphere and flavors of {{restaurantName}} in person. Reserve your spot today.
socialSubtitle: Join our community for updates, special offers, and behind-the-scenes looks.
empowerSubtitle: The all-in-one platform for online ordering, reservations, and websites. Commission-free options available.
featureOrderingDesc: Keep 100% of your profits with our subscription plans, or choose our flexible pay-as-you-go model.
featureWebsiteDesc: Create a stunning, SEO-optimized website for your restaurant in minutes. No coding required.
featureAnalyticsDesc: Understand your customers with deep analytics and get AI recommendations to boost sales.
featureReservationsDesc: Manage bookings seamlessly and reduce no-shows with automated confirmations.
faq1A: Not at all. Tablo is designed for restaurant owners, not developers. If you can send an email, you can manage your restaurant online.
faq2Q: Can I use my own domain?
faq2A: Yes! Our Premium plan allows you to connect your own custom domain (e.g., www.myrestaurant.com).
faq3A: We integrate directly with Stripe. Payouts are automatic and secure, landing in your bank account daily or weekly.
contactSubtitle: Send us a message and we'll get you set up with a free demo.
messageSent: Message sent! We'll be in touch shortly.
restaurantClosedAtTime: The restaurant is closed at this selected time. Please choose another time.
